room_title: Escape room "The Seventh Stone - Secrets of Abydos" by Planet Deadline Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
room_description:
According to a legend, one of the pharaohs of ancient Egypt was on a quest of searching for seven mysterious stones. He intended to construct a device that would have the power to change the world. However, he never completed the search and the stones were long forgotten. Until recently...
Dr. Cornelius Carter believes he has uncovered new findings about the pharaoh and his stones. He was able to locate the pyramid where the stones are supposedly located but never made it back from the expedition.
Equipped with 60 minutes of oxygen you must enter the pyramid, find Dr. Carter and complete his mission. Can you uncover the secrets of Abydos?
